title: A Trve relation of a Scotchman, vvho comming into the church of St. Olaves in the old iury in London, at such time as the people were receiving the communion, did much disturb them, and by force tore the service-book in peeces, on Sunday Septemb. 5, 1641 with an admonition to all such abortives amongst us, to perswade them to waite the time of the Lords reformation by the Parliament, and not to be so disorderly.
notes: Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
